'''1.21.62''' is a hotfix for ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on February 25, 2025 on most platforms and February 26, 2025 for Nintendo Switch, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/34543756347021-Minecraft-1-21-62-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.62 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=February 25, 2025}}</ref> It is also the last version to support Android 8.0.

== Changes ==
=== Technical ===
'''[[Dedicated Server]]'''
*Exposed a new parameter for dedicated server when in {{cd|server-auth-with-rewind}}. This will make the server more strict on entity interactions. Look in {{cd|[[server.properties]]}} for more information on what these do.
**{{cd|server-authoritative-entity-interactions-strict}} default to {{cd|false}} and can be set to {{cd|true}}. Will affect entity interaction acceptance.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.62
|;old
|189501|Attacking a mob while sprint jumping randomly removes all of the player's momentum, sometimes even teleporting the player backwards
|190550|Crafting a Bundle consumes materials but does not create a new Bundle if holding one in Survival
|190552|New bedrock pvp is broken after update
|190604|Sleeping in a bed causes the player's collision to break
|190606|Hover Note is broken on bedrock
|otherissuescount=1}}
'''Other'''
*Fixed an issue that could prevent joining a Realm through the Friends drawer.
